decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (515-100-AL(02).dwg, 515-101-AL(02).dwg, 515-102-AL(02).dwg, 515-103-AL(02).dwg, 515-104-AL(02).dwg, 515-111-AL(02).dwg, 515-120-AL(02).dwg, 515-120-AL(02).dwg (duplicate ref), received 04 August 2014 and 515-140-AL.dwg, 515-140-AL.dwg, 515-142-AL.dwg, 515-143-AL.dwg, 515-144-AL.dwg, 515-151-AL.dwg, 515-160-AL.dwg, 515-160-AL.dwg (duplicate ref), received 16 September 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extensions hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Joint application for the erection of a first floor rear infill extension to the properties at number 19 and 21 Coombe Road
